segments.text: I see the girl standing there, looking up at the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent, just waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she trusts her brother to get her a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad for her, hoping she doesn't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how precarious the situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just a little girl, wanting a simple snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both stay safe and don't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's going to be really sad if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and help them.
segments.speaker: PAR
